KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: One of two required courses
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student must take one of two specified courses

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: All of required courses
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student must take all of the specified courses

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: All of required courses
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student must be enrolled in all of the following courses

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: One of required courses
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student must be enrolled in one of the following courses

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: N of required courses
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student must take <n> courses from the specified courses

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: None of required courses
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student must have completed none of the specified courses

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Minimum overall GPA
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student needs to have attained a minimum specified GPA

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Course completed with minimum specified grade
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student must take <n> credits from the specified courses

KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: None of required programs
KSLU_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Enrollment is not available to students in the following programs
